name: PublishAspNetCoreWebAppToAzure
description: Publish ASP.NET Core Application to Azure.
author: Brandon Martinez

inputs.name: AzureApplicationPath
inputs.label: Application Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the folder containing your web app root.

inputs.name: AzureTargetWebApps
inputs.label: Azure Target Web App(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure web apps to deploy web job. Put additional web apps on separate lines or separate them with a comma or semicolon.

inputs.name: AzureTargetWebAppSlotName
inputs.label: Azure Target Web App Slot Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The slot to deploy the web job to.

inputs.name: AzureWebAppForceStop
inputs.label: Stop Web App for Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, stop the application during deployment. If false, restarts the instance before deployment instead of stopping completely.
